[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Adds straitjackets that disable mental breaks on colonists to prevent them from hurting themselves or others.
[h1]When equipped:[/h1] [list] [*]Global Work Speed -98% [*]Manipulation 0% [*]Move Speed -70% [*]Mental Break Threshold Boosted [*]95% chance of disabling mental break [/list]
